title: Govt vigilant about EVs safety, experts on the job: Minister
description: Replying to a question in the Lok Sabha, Minister of State for Heavy Industries, Krishan Pal Gurjar, said that the government has taken a serious note of the battery explosion incidents in EV two-wheelers, and an expert panel is looking into it. The minister informed that out of 6,656 EVs recalled, Okinawa Autotech recalled 3,215 units, PureEV recalled 2,000 EVs and Ola Electric recalled 1,441 units.
